venue.name: The Tennis Courts in Boston Common

item.description:
It's on this weekend!! Just bring yourself and your game cause I don't know where mine is:-) Don't worry about the equipments...they will be there. Looks like we have enough people committed to the volleyball tomorrow. The weather should be nice. We will meet at the tennis courts in the Boston Common at 11:00am. The tennis courts are at the corner of Tremont and Boylston street....close to the AMC theater on Tremont street. If you can't make it by 11:15 to the tennis courts please look for us (volleyball net) along the side of the Boston Common on Tremont street between Park Street T-stop and Boylston T-stop.

See you guys/gals there tomorrow. If you have any question please shoot me an email.

Remember everyone is welcome BUT since this is 2s you MUST know how to pass and set correctly...don't worry if you haven't play in awhile if you're technically sound it should come back. We need at least 6 people committed to coming this weekend. If you have extra AVP volleyballs bring them...the more balls the least we have to chase.

Enough with the talking lets play:-)
item.name: The Boston 2s Beach/Grass Volleyball Meetup
